Wildcat Wilderness Orientation


























Recent trip photos








The mission of Adventure Outings (AO) is to enhance the CSU, Chico community through student-powered outdoor recreation.







What does Adventure Outings Do?
AO operates an extensive trips program (including custom trips for groups) that is open to anyone ages 18+AO has an equipment rental center that is open to anyoneWe manage the WREC Climbing GymWe oversee the AS Bike Hub, Chico State’s campus bicycle repair programWe operate a backcountry yurt that is available for rentAO offers a Wildcat Wilderness Orientation program for incoming Chico studentsWe host special events such as the Banff Mountain Film Festival and NOLS wilderness medicine coursesWe offer CSU, Chico students employment as trip leaders and as office, climbing wall, bike repair, and equipment rental center attendants
